mainSection.title: AI at the Edge with Jetson
mainSection.description: Experience the power of AI at the edge with NVIDIA Jetson. These compact, energy-efficient devices bring advanced AI capabilities directly to edge applications, enabling real-time data processing, intelligent decision-making, and enhanced device control without relying on cloud connectivity.

subSections.title: What is NVIDIA Jetson?
subSections.description: NVIDIA Jetson is a series of powerful, small-form-factor computers designed to run AI workloads at the edge. By integrating high-performance GPUs and AI software, Jetson delivers on-device intelligence for robotics, industrial automation, smart cities, and more.

subSections.title: Purpose and Applications
subSections.description: The Jetson platform showcases how edge computing can provide AI-driven solutions that are fast, efficient, and capable of real-time decision-making. It's perfect for scenarios where low latency, privacy, and autonomy are crucial.

rotatingSections.title: Edge AI Processing
rotatingSections.description: Learn how NVIDIA Jetson enables AI processing at the edge, offering real-time decision-making without cloud dependencies.
bulletPoints: On-device AI for faster processing and lower latency.
Ideal for use in environments with limited connectivity.
Reduces dependency on cloud infrastructure for real-time tasks.
Enhanced privacy by keeping data processing local.

rotatingSections.title: AI for Robotics
rotatingSections.description: Discover how Jetson is used to power advanced robotics, enabling intelligent movement, obstacle detection, and autonomous decision-making.
bulletPoints: Real-time object detection and recognition.
Autonomous navigation and decision-making capabilities.
Integration with sensors for obstacle detection and avoidance.
Used in drones, robotic arms, and autonomous vehicles.

rotatingSections.title: Smart Cameras and Vision Systems
rotatingSections.description: Explore how Jetson powers smart cameras and vision systems, providing insights for security, monitoring, and industrial automation.
bulletPoints: Real-time video analysis and image recognition.
Applications in surveillance and industrial monitoring.
Detection of anomalies in production lines.
Edge processing for enhanced privacy and speed.

rotatingSections.title: AI-Driven Smart Cities
rotatingSections.description: See how Jetson is used to build smart city solutions, improving infrastructure with AI for traffic management, safety, and energy efficiency.
bulletPoints: Traffic flow analysis and smart signaling.
Real-time monitoring for safety and security.
AI-driven analytics for public services optimization.
Energy management through intelligent street lighting.

rotatingSections.title: AI for Industrial Automation
rotatingSections.description: Jetson's capabilities in industrial automation help improve efficiency, safety, and reliability in manufacturing and production settings.
bulletPoints: Predictive maintenance for machinery.
Real-time quality control with computer vision.
AI-driven automation for repetitive tasks.
Reduction of downtime through smart analytics.

rotatingSections.title: Future of Edge AI with Jetson
rotatingSections.description: Get a glimpse into the future of edge computing with NVIDIA Jetson, where advancements in hardware and software will continue to push the boundaries of what's possible at the edge.
bulletPoints: Smaller, more powerful AI edge devices.
Improved energy efficiency for longer deployments.
Integration with 5G for faster data processing.
New use cases in healthcare, retail, and environmental monitoring.
